c: ^'What is the purpose of our journey, Monsieur?'

^'That is what we will endeavour to find out,' he answered.
^'Twenty thousand pounds,' he replied, quite flatly.

s: ^I asked nothing further of him then
c: ^, and after a final, polite cough, he offered nothing more to me.
^,' I replied, uncertain what I thought.
